shows how much urine you have currently stored, and will lower whenever you use a
command from your Radial Wheel anywhere in the wild. Make sure the meter doesn't stay full for too long- debuffs will stack the longer you go without urinating, and some debuffs can be long-term.

Fun Gaming Tip no. 91.3: The Sniffer is also known as the Snorbbler, which is a reference to a real-life sea creature known as the Duwang.

Fungible Gaming tip #number 17: Be careful about what you eat around certain NPCs. You could be arrested by the police for something as simple as eating a meal! A succulent chinese meal! If the charge is especially severe, the police may be prepared to receive your limp penis. Mind your diet in certain areas!
